leaf.name: FOLLOW
leaf.description: The client follows its target

leaf.name: NO_FOLLOW
leaf.description: The client stop following its target

leaf.name: USER_CHARS
leaf.description: The EGS send existing characters of player to client

leaf.name: CREATE_CHAR
leaf.description: The client creates a character, type is $u32, and name is $s

leaf.name: DELETE_CHAR
leaf.description: The client delete a character, slot of character is $u8

leaf.name: RENAME_CHAR
leaf.description: The client rename a character, $u8 : slot of character $s : name $s : surname

leaf.name: ENTER
leaf.description: The client leave create/select interface and enter in game, at this point, the FE association uid = sid is made

leaf.name: READY
leaf.description: The client is ready to enter the world

leaf.name: TIME_DATE_SYNCHRO
leaf.description: The WOS send to client the tiem and date of server: server tick $u32 ryzom time $f ryzom day $u32

leaf.name: ASK_NAME
leaf.description: Ask server if a name is not already present

leaf.name: VALID_NAME
leaf.description: Server answer yes or no the name is already affected for a player

leaf.name: CREATE_CHAR_ERROR
leaf.description: Server refuse character creation and fill and send to client a boolean structure with false for all parameters refused

leaf.name: RECONNECT
leaf.description: Client quits the game and returns to the select character menu

leaf.name: SERVER_RECONNECT_OK
leaf.description: Server acknowledges reconnection request

leaf.name: SERVER_QUIT_OK
leaf.description: EGS send a force quit command to client

leaf.name: SERVER_QUIT_ABORT
leaf.description: EGS send to client a msg to indicate a quit game command has been aborted

leaf.name: CLIENT_QUIT_REQUEST
leaf.description: client want to quit

leaf.name: FAR_TP
leaf.description: EGS tells the client to connect elsewhere

leaf.name: RET_MAINLAND
leaf.description: client quits a ring session

leaf.name: DB_UPD_INV
leaf.description: EGS sends an inventory update to the client

leaf.name: POSITION
leaf.description: the client moves to ($i32,$i32,$i32) with heading $f

leaf.name: DEPOSIT
leaf.description: the client shearch a deposit for harvest/digging (param = skill used)

leaf.name: CLOSE_TEMP_INVENTORY
leaf.description: the server force the client to close the temp inventory

leaf.name: TRAINING
leaf.description: the client starts a training action

leaf.name: SET_JOB_STATUS
leaf.description: player want change one of his job status (job, status)

leaf.name: SWAP_JOB_STATUS
leaf.description: player want change one of his job status( job freezed, job actived)

leaf.name: VALIDATE_MELEE
leaf.description: the client validate or invalidate the melee combat (check position and orientation), validation flag $u8

leaf.name: PARRY
leaf.description: the client toggle chooses parry as his defense mode

leaf.name: DODGE
leaf.description: the client toggle chooses dodge as his defense mode

leaf.name: PROTECTED_SLOT
leaf.description: the client select a new slot to defend (or none)

leaf.name: FLYING_HP_DELTA
leaf.description: add a flying text to an entity (u32 entity, u32 rgba, s16 delta)

leaf.name: FLYING_TEXT_ISE
leaf.description: add a flying text to an entity (u32 entity, u32 rgba, u8 effect, s32 param)

leaf.name: FLYING_TEXT
leaf.description: add a flying text to an entity (u32 entity, u8 type)

leaf.name: TELL
leaf.description: the client sends a tell to the character $e : $s

leaf.name: FAR_TELL
leaf.description: the client receive a far tell from a player on another shard

leaf.name: CHAT
leaf.description: the client sends the chat message : $s

leaf.name: CHAT_TEAM
leaf.description: the client sends the chat message to his team: $s

leaf.name: FILTER
leaf.description: the client adds/removes the chat filter $u8

leaf.name: CHAT_MODE
leaf.description: the client selects the chat mode $u8 $64. second param is 0 or the dynamic chat Id (an eid)

leaf.name: CHAT2
leaf.description: a npc send a predef message to the client : $s

leaf.name: TELL2
leaf.description: a npc send a predef message to the client : $s

leaf.name: DYN_STRING
leaf.description: system send a dyn string to the client system chat: $u32

leaf.name: DYN_STRING_GROUP
leaf.description: system send a dyn string to the client gived group chat: $u32 $u16

leaf.name: AFK_TXT
leaf.description: the client sets an afk custom text

leaf.name: ADD_BRICK
leaf.description: the client add brick (family $u16/index $u8/slot u8) in sentence

leaf.name: SHARE_OPEN
leaf.description: the server wants the share interface to be opened

leaf.name: SHARE_VALID_ITEM
leaf.description: the client wants an item or phrase (item/phrase index, session id)

leaf.name: SHARE_INVALID_ITEM
leaf.description: the client do not wants an item or phrase anymore (item/phrase index, session id)

leaf.name: SHARE_VALID
leaf.description: the client wants to validate its selection (session id)

leaf.name: SHARE_INVALID
leaf.description: the server invalidate the client selection

leaf.name: SHARE_CLOSE
leaf.description: the server wants the share interface to be closed

leaf.name: CONTACT_INIT
leaf.description: the server initialize the 2 contacts lists (net_manager.cpp to see the message format)

leaf.name: CONTACT_ADD
leaf.description: the client wants to add a contact ($uc name $u8 list)

leaf.name: CONTACT_DEL
leaf.description: the client wants to delete a contact ($u32 contactId $u8 list)

leaf.name: CONTACT_MOVE
leaf.description: the client wants to move a contact from one list to the other ($u32 contactId $u8 listSrc)

leaf.name: CONTACT_CREATE
leaf.description: the server create a contact

leaf.name: CONTACT_STATUS
leaf.description: the server give the status of a contact

leaf.name: CONTACT_REMOVE
leaf.description: the server removes a contact

leaf.name: HARVEST
leaf.description: the client want harvest a founded Raw material(slot, quantity)

leaf.name: GIVE
leaf.description: the client give an item to target (inventory, slot, quantity)

leaf.name: DESTROY
leaf.description: destroy the content of an inventory slot params : inventory, slot,quantity

leaf.name: EQUIP
leaf.description: the client equip character (equiped inventory, equiped inventory slot, bag slot)

leaf.name: UNEQUIP
leaf.description: the client unequip character (equiped inventory, equiped inventory slot)

leaf.name: TEMP_TO_BAG
leaf.description: the client pick an item from temp inventory (temp inventory slot)

leaf.name: ALL_TEMP
leaf.description: the client pick all items from temp inventory

leaf.name: NO_TEMP
leaf.description: the client drop all items from temp inventory

leaf.name: ENCHANT
leaf.description: the client wants to enchant the right hand item with the current one (inventory, slot)

leaf.name: OPEN_ROOM_INVENTORY
leaf.description: EGS wants to open the user inventory

leaf.name: CLOSE_ROOM_INVENTORY
leaf.description: EGS wants to close the user inventory

leaf.name: USE_ITEM
leaf.description: client wants to use teleport in the specified bag slot or consume an item to trigger its effect

leaf.name: STOP_USE_XP_CAT
leaf.description: client wants to stop using xp catalyser

leaf.name: RESPAWN
leaf.description: teleport the player to his respawn point

leaf.name: BOT
leaf.description: teleport the player near the bot

leaf.name: RESPAWN_POINT
leaf.description: server set the respawn points with a bool to know if the client needs to reset all known points first

leaf.name: ASK_RESPAWN
leaf.description: client wants to respawn somewhere (index of the respawn location wanted)

leaf.name: RESPAWN
leaf.description: server teleport the client to the respawn point choosen

leaf.name: BEAST
leaf.description: client send a beast order(beast u8, order u8)

leaf.name: MOUNT_ABORT
leaf.description: server refuse the client mount command

leaf.name: CLOSE_INVITATION
leaf.description: message sent to the client to force his invitation popup to close

leaf.name: ADD
leaf.description: add an item from the bag(inventory_src index_in_bag index_in_exchange quantity)

leaf.name: REMOVE
leaf.description: remove an item from the exchange

leaf.name: WHERE
leaf.description: client ask server send his server position

leaf.name: WHO
leaf.description: client ask list of all clients connected to server

leaf.name: REPLY_WHERE
leaf.description: server send to client his server position

leaf.name: CMD
leaf.description: the client wants to execute command : $b $s $s $s

leaf.name: PING
leaf.description: the client send a ping with tick game time of emission

leaf.name: EMOTE
leaf.description: client send the emote (behaviour, phrase id) to play.

leaf.name: CUSTOM_EMOTE
leaf.description: client send the custom emote (behaviour, custom text) to play.

leaf.name: WHERE
leaf.description: client send the where command

leaf.name: ADMIN
leaf.description: client asks EGS to execute the command $s with arg $s

leaf.name: ADMIN_OFFLINE
leaf.description: client asks EGS to execute on character $s (online or offline) the command $s with arg $s

leaf.name: REMOTE_ADMIN
leaf.description: server send the client a remote command

leaf.name: REMOTE_ADMIN_ANSWER
leaf.description: client send the answer of the remote command

leaf.name: SIT
leaf.description: client send to the server the sitting state

leaf.name: AFK
leaf.description: AFK command is sent to EGS

leaf.name: SELFKILL
leaf.description: client asks EGS to kill self

leaf.name: RANDOM
leaf.description: client asks EGS to roll a dice and tell result around

leaf.name: GUILDMOTD
leaf.description: client asks EGS to set the guild message of the day

leaf.name: AUTOPACT
leaf.description: client want set AUTOPACT to TRUE or FALSE

leaf.name: SET_MP
leaf.description: the client set the sheet id of the MP exotic brick knowledge to eval

leaf.name: SET_MP_LEVEL
leaf.description: the client set the exact level of the MP to eval

leaf.name: SET_MARKET
leaf.description: the client set the sheet id of the market knowledge 's brick

leaf.name: EXECUTE
leaf.description: the client validate the evaluation

leaf.name: NEXT_PAGE_ITEM
leaf.description: Client ask for the next trade page

leaf.name: NEXT_PAGE_MISSION
leaf.description: Client ask for the next mission page

leaf.name: START_TRADE_ITEM
leaf.description: start bot chat trade item with the given session id

leaf.name: START_TRADE_TELEPORT
leaf.description: start bot chat trade teleport with the given session id

leaf.name: START_TRADE_FACTION
leaf.description: start bot chat trade of faction items with the given session id

leaf.name: START_TRADE_SKILL
leaf.description: start bot chat skills with the given session id

leaf.name: START_TRADE_PACT
leaf.description: start bot chat pacts with the given session id

leaf.name: START_TRADE_ACTION
leaf.description: start bot chat actions with the given session id

leaf.name: BUY
leaf.description: Client buy object. param1: index in list. Param2: quantity

leaf.name: SELL
leaf.description: Client sell item in: 1/ inventory id INVENTORIES::EInventory 2/ index 3/ quantity 4/ resale price

leaf.name: DESTROY_ITEM
leaf.description: Client destroy an item in sell store. param1: index in list. Param2: quantity

leaf.name: REFRESH_TRADE_LIST
leaf.description: Client want refresh trade list from current Bot

leaf.name: SET_FILTERS
leaf.format: u32 u32 u32 u32 u8 u8 u8 u8
leaf.description: Client Set filter for trade list: 1/MinQuality 2/MaxQuality 3/MinPrice 4/MaxPrice 5/MinClass 6/MaxClass 7/ItemPart 8/ItemType, NoFilter = 0 ~0 0 ~0 0 0 RM_FABER_TYPE::Unknown values ITEM_TYPE::UNDEFINED

leaf.name: START_CHOOSE_MISSION
leaf.description: start bot chat mission choice with the given session id

leaf.name: START_DYNAMIC_MISSION
leaf.description: start bot chat dynamic mission with the given session id

leaf.name: CONTINUE_MISSION
leaf.description: the user completed the mission, with no gift required

leaf.name: VALIDATE_PLAYER_GIFT
leaf.description: the user validate the gift he just made (server aknowledged the gift to be a valid one)

leaf.name: PICK_MISSION
leaf.description: message sent when a mission is accepted (from the static mission list)

leaf.name: DM_CHOICE
leaf.description: the three choices for dynamic mission selection

leaf.name: DM_ACCEPT
leaf.description: accept current dynamic mission

leaf.name: START_NEWS
leaf.description: start bot chat new page

leaf.name: START_CREATE_GUILD
leaf.description: start bot chat page to create a guild

leaf.name: END
leaf.description: end chat with a bot sent to EGS

leaf.name: FORCE_END
leaf.description: force the end of the bot chat on the client side

leaf.name: START_CHOOSE_DUTY
leaf.description: client ask EGS for duty list ( param is session id )

leaf.name: NEXT_PAGE_DUTY
leaf.description: client ask EGS for next duty page ( param is session id )

leaf.name: DUTY_APPLY
leaf.description: client apply for a duty (param is the GLOBAL index of the duty)

leaf.name: DUTY_CANCEL_APPLY
leaf.description: client cancel apply for a duty

leaf.name: START_TRADE_GUILD_OPTIONS
leaf.description: client ask EGS for guild option list ( param is session id )

leaf.name: BUY_GUILD_OPTION
leaf.description: client buy a guild option (param is the GLOBAL index of the option)

leaf.name: START_GUILD_RESEARCH
leaf.description: client ask EGS for a guild research list ( param is session id )

leaf.name: DESTROY_BUILDING
leaf.description: client destroy the building of his ZC

leaf.name: DYNCHAT_OPEN
leaf.description: server wants to dynamically chat with the client (Bot UID, Bot Name, Vector of DynString)

leaf.name: DYNCHAT_CLOSE
leaf.description: server wants to close dynamic chat (Bot UID)

leaf.name: DYNCHAT_SEND
leaf.description: client answer to the server dynamic dialog (Bot UID, Answer Nb)

leaf.name: INIT_COMPLETED_MISSIONS
leaf.description: a vector of text ids is sent to init the mission journal (vector(uint32) )

leaf.name: UPDATE_COMPLETED_MISSIONS
leaf.description: a text id is sent to add a mission title to the mission journal (uint32)

leaf.name: MISSION_ABANDON
leaf.description: the client wants to abandon a mission (mission same as in database)

leaf.name: GROUP_MISSION_ABANDON
leaf.description: the client wants to abandon a team mission (mission same as in database)

leaf.name: ADD_COMPASS
leaf.description: EGS adds a compass target for no list missions. Params X, Y, name. If the client already has the name, the coords are replaced

leaf.name: ADD_COMPASS_BOT
leaf.description: Same for bots. Params X, Y, name, bot_datasetid

leaf.name: REMOVE_COMPASS
leaf.description: EGS adds a compass target for no list missions. Params name

leaf.name: REMOVE_COMPASS_BOT
leaf.description: Same for bots. Params name, bot_dataseetid

leaf.name: SET_LANGUAGE
leaf.description: The client send the language code to use for this session.

leaf.name: PHRASE_SEND
leaf.description: The IOS send the prepared phrase to the client.

leaf.name: STRING_RQ
leaf.description: the client ask the string manager for an unknow string

leaf.name: STRING_RESP
leaf.description: The IOS return the requested string yo the client.

leaf.name: RELOAD_CACHE
leaf.description: The IOS send it's initial cache time stamp or a new one at run time.

leaf.name: CREATE
leaf.description: client wants to create a guild (name of new guild, guild icon descriptor, description of the guild)

leaf.name: ABORT_CREATION
leaf.description: server forces the end of a guild create session

leaf.name: OPEN_GUILD_WINDOW
leaf.description: the client just entered a guild, EGS ask the client to open the guild window

leaf.name: JOIN_PROPOSAL
leaf.description: invitation sent to client (uint32 textId)

leaf.name: SET_GRADE
leaf.description: client change a member grade p1 is the member, p2 is the grade ( see GUILD_GRADES enum ), p3 is the state counter

leaf.name: SET_LEADER
leaf.description: client leader in its guild wants to set the new leader specifying the name of the new leader p1 is the member, p2 is the state counter

leaf.name: KICK_MEMBER
leaf.description: client (lead,ho,of) wants to kick member specifying its index. Last param is the counter

leaf.name: TELEPORT
leaf.description: client wants to teleport somewhere in guild flats

leaf.name: ASCENSOR
leaf.description: Server requests the launch of ascensor interface

leaf.name: FIRST_ASCENSOR_PAGE
leaf.description: Client ask for the first ascensor page specifying the session id

leaf.name: NEXT_ASCENSOR_PAGE
leaf.description: Client ask for the next ascensor page specifying the session id

leaf.name: LEAVE_ASCENSOR
leaf.description: Server requests the closing of ascensor interface

leaf.name: QUIT
leaf.description: Client wants to quit its guild

leaf.name: SET_PLAYER_TITLE
leaf.description: the client inform the server it has changed its character title (u8=new title(ECharacterTitle))

leaf.name: UPDATE_PLAYER_TITLE
leaf.description: the server update some reserved titles

leaf.name: USE_FEMALE_TITLES
leaf.description: The EGS sends to client whether female titles are used

leaf.name: PUT_MONEY
leaf.description: put money in guild warehouse

leaf.name: TAKE_MONEY
leaf.description: take money from guild warehouse

leaf.name: OPEN_INVENTORY
leaf.description: open the guild inventory

leaf.name: CLOSE_INVENTORY
leaf.description: close the guild inventory

leaf.name: GIVEUP_OUTPOST
leaf.description: Give up an outpost (outpostSHEET)

leaf.name: SELECT
leaf.description: Select an outpost to display its state (outpostSHEET). = Fill OUTPOST_SELECTED DB

leaf.name: UNSELECT
leaf.description: Unselect any outpost display

leaf.name: DECLARE_WAR_START
leaf.description: The User try to Declare War to the outpost (outpostSHEET, startHourForAttackPeriod)

leaf.name: DECLARE_WAR_ACK
leaf.description: The server answer to the client (bool ok, uint32 textId, uint32 resultStartAttackTime)

leaf.name: DECLARE_WAR_VALIDATE
leaf.description: The user confirms its Declare war (outpostSHEET, startHourForAttackPeriod, resultStartAttackTimeForCheck). NB: still can fail = sysinfo

leaf.name: SET_DEF_PERIOD
leaf.description: The defender changes the defense period of one of its Outpost (outpostSHEET, start hour for defense period)

leaf.name: SET_SQUAD
leaf.description: Set a training squad in a slot (outpostSHEET, slot, squadNUMBER_IN_SQUAD_SHOP_DB)

leaf.name: SET_SQUAD_SPAWN
leaf.description: Set spawn zone of a training squad (outpostSHEET, slot, spawn_index)

leaf.name: INSERT_SQUAD
leaf.description: Insert a (default) training squad BEFORE the slot (outpostSHEET, slot)

leaf.name: REMOVE_SQUAD
leaf.description: Remove a training squad in a slot (outpostSHEET, slot)

leaf.name: SET_SQUAD_CAPITAL
leaf.description: Set the War Capital of the outpost (outpostSHEET, money)

leaf.name: CHOOSE_SIDE
leaf.description: participate or not in outpost, choose side if participate (b playerGuildInConflict, b playerGuildIsAttacker, u32 defNameId, u32 attNameId)

leaf.name: SIDE_CHOSEN
leaf.description: user chooses to participate or not in outpost conflict and on which side

leaf.name: BANISH_PLAYER
leaf.description: user want to banish the player he's targeting

leaf.name: BANISH_GUILD
leaf.description: user want to banish the guild of the player he's targeting

leaf.name: BUY_BUILDING
leaf.description: Buy a new building (version, outpostnb, line)

leaf.name: DESTROY_BUILDING
leaf.description: Destroy a building (version, outpostnb, list, line)

leaf.name: DELETE
leaf.description: the client delete a Known phrase

leaf.name: FORGET
leaf.description: the client forget a Memorized phrase (MemoryTypeId / MemorySlotId)

leaf.name: EXECUTE
leaf.description: the client execute a Memorized phrase (MemoryTypeId / MemorySlotId)

leaf.name: EXECUTE_CYCLIC
leaf.description: the client execute set a cyclic Memorized phrase (MemoryTypeId / MemorySlotId)

leaf.name: BUY
leaf.description: the client buy a botChat phrase (indexInBotChat, phraseId)

leaf.name: BUY_SHEET
leaf.description: the client buy a botChat phrase (phrase SheetId, phraseId). Nb: can be a charac phrase

leaf.name: CANCEL_LINK
leaf.description: the client cancel a link $link_id/$counter

leaf.name: CANCEL_TOP
leaf.description: the client cancel it's top phrase

leaf.name: CANCEL_ALL
leaf.description: the client cancel all its phrases

leaf.name: CRISTALIZE
leaf.description: the client cristalize a Memorized phrase (MemoryTypeId / MemorySlotId)

leaf.name: EXEC_CYCLIC_ACK
leaf.description: server send an ack on cyclic phrase execution :$b $u8

leaf.name: EXEC_NEXT_ACK
leaf.description: server send an ack on 'next' phrase execution :$b $u8

leaf.name: GET
leaf.description: the client ask for a special item info in a inventory slot: inventoryId(u8HIGH)/slotId(u8LOW)

leaf.name: SET
leaf.description: Server answer to the previous message. A CItemInfos class is filled

leaf.name: REFRESH_VERSION
leaf.description: Like set but contains only the version, no info required

leaf.name: GET
leaf.description: the client ask for prerequisit infos: slotId

leaf.name: SET
leaf.description: Server answer to the previous message. A CPrerequisitInfos class is filled

leaf.name: ENTER_CRITICAL
leaf.description: client answer yes/no to enter request (bool)

leaf.name: ASK_ENTER_CRITICAL
leaf.description: EGS ask player if he wants to enter a mission critical part, player must answer wihtin 1 minute

leaf.name: CLOSE_ENTER_CRITICAL
leaf.description: EGS tell client to close the 'enter critical' proposal window

leaf.name: WAKE
leaf.description: client wakes up for mission $u8 (mission same as in database)

leaf.name: GROUP_WAKE
leaf.description: client wakes up for group mission $u8 (mission same as in database)

leaf.name: ASK
leaf.description: client wants to duel its target

leaf.name: ACCEPT
leaf.description: client accept a duel

leaf.name: REFUSE
leaf.description: client refuses a duel

leaf.name: ABANDON
leaf.description: client abandon a duel

leaf.name: INVITATION
leaf.description: invitation sent to client (uint32 textId)

leaf.name: CANCEL_INVITATION
leaf.description: cancel invitation popup (no param)

leaf.name: ASK
leaf.description: client wants to duel its target

leaf.name: ACCEPT
leaf.description: client accept a duel

leaf.name: REFUSE
leaf.description: client refuses a duel

leaf.name: ABANDON
leaf.description: client abandon a duel

leaf.name: INVITATION
leaf.description: invitation sent to client (uint32 textId)

leaf.name: CANCEL_INVITATION
leaf.description: cancel invitation popup (no param)

leaf.name: PVP_TAG
leaf.description: client want set PVP_TAG to TRUE or FALSE

leaf.name: SET_NEUTRAL_ALLEGIANCE
leaf.description: client want set allegiance to neutral from indetermined status (u8 = PVP_CLAN::TPVPClan (game_share/pvp_clan.h))

leaf.name: SET_NEUTRAL_ALLEGIANCE_GUILD
leaf.description: client want set allegiance to neutral from indetermined status for his GUILD (u8 = PVP_CLAN::TPVPClan (game_share/pvp_clan.h))

leaf.name: PUSH_FACTION_WAR
leaf.description: a new faction war starts

leaf.name: POP_FACTION_WAR
leaf.description: a faction ends

leaf.name: FACTION_WARS
leaf.description: a faction ends

leaf.name: UPDATE
leaf.description: server update the encyclopedia (see msg_encyclopedia.cpp in game_share for the message format)

leaf.name: INIT
leaf.description: server sends the whole encyclopedia to the client

leaf.name: BARS
leaf.description: server update the players Bars (fast message) $msgNumber $hp $sap $sta $focus

leaf.name: POPUP
leaf.description: server display an important info message on the client (u32 titleDynString u32 textDynString)

leaf.name: SET_ITEM_CUSTOM_TEXT
leaf.description: set the cursom of the item in inventory $inventory in slot $slot to $text

leaf.name: DUMMY
leaf.description: stupid server.....

leaf.name: BUILD
leaf.description: client has built a totem

leaf.name: DUMMY
leaf.description: stupid server.....

leaf.name: FEOPEN
leaf.description: The fe gateway route is open

leaf.name: GATEWAY_MSG
leaf.description: the fe module gateway transport send a message to the client transport peer

leaf.name: FECLOSE
leaf.description: The fe gateway route is closed

leaf.name: DUMMY
leaf.description: stupid server.....

leaf.name: VALIDATE
leaf.format: u32 u8 u32 u8 u32 u8 u32 u8 u32 u8 u32 u8 u32 u8 u32 u8

leaf.name: MISSION_RING_SELECT
leaf.description: client choose an action in ring mission (u8 = actionId)

leaf.name: GET_DESC
leaf.description: client to server request

leaf.name: SET_DESC
leaf.description: server response

leaf.name: SVR_EVENT_MIS_AVL
leaf.description: server had an event that might change mission availability

leaf.name: SET_TIMER
leaf.description: server sets a new timer period
